title: The Ladybird story
creator_credit: Pat Dowling Pictures and Pat Dowling
brief_description: The discovery of the Vedalia ladybird beetle in Australia, in 1885; how it benefits humans in controlling harmful pests; exported to America where an entire industry was threatened by the cottony-cushion scale. Life cycle of scale and beetle shown in closeup.
